action.action-desc: Mr. Huizenga (for himself and Mr. Donalds) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To establish a special notice requirement for certain drawdowns or sales from the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Strategic Petroleum Reserve Transparency Act.
Section 161 of the Energy Policy and Conservation Act (42 U.S.C. 6241) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subsection.text: For any drawdown or sale of petroleum products from the Strategic Petroleum Reserve that occurs during the 5-month period immediately preceding a regularly scheduled Federal general election, the Secretary shall, concurrently with such drawdown or sale, submit in writing to Congress a report detailing the reason for such drawdown or sale.
